name: RESET (itch) (DivyanshK86)
description:
Controls:

- Use W,A,S,D to move

- Use mouse to rotate the camera

- Press R to reset yourself or replay your history ghosts

- Press escape to restart the level

How to Play:

- Reach the green button to complete a level

- You can spawn a set amount of your clones by pressing [R]. These clones will mimic the way you played before you last hit [R] to reset yourself.

- The number of clones that you can make are different per level. Once your RESETs(the count on the top left of the screen) reach 0, pressing R will no longer spawn your clones but the replay will still work.

- If you think you made some wrong decisions, have no RESETs left anymore, and are stuck, then you can always press [Esc] key to restart the whole level from the beginning.

-----------------------------------------------------

RESET is a puzzle platformer. It's a game about replaying, helping your future self, and platforming.
